headline: 5 Insightful Analyst Questions From Honeywell’s Q1 Earnings Call
summary: Honeywell’s first quarter saw a positive market reaction as the company delivered revenue and non-GAAP profit above Wall Street expectations. Management attributed the performance to strong demand in aerospace, particularly in commercial aftermarket and defense, alongside steady execution in building automation.
